text.author: Amy Baldwin, Lisa August, James Bennett, Sabrina Mathues, Susan Monroe, MJ O'Leary, Ann Pearson, Joshua Troesh, and Margit Watts
text.title: College Success
text.summary: This section explains how studies have shown the benefits of grit and resilience in successful learning and gives an example of applying grit in studying for an exam over multiple attempts.
